name: Giant Killer
prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @feat:cleave AND @feat:goblin_cleaver AND @feat:orc_hewer AND @feat:power_attack AND @feat:strike_back AND @bab >= 11 AND @race:dwarf
descriptionText: Your cleaving strokes menace giants and larger foes.
benefitText: This functions as Goblin Cleaver, but your additional attacks can be made against creatures one size category larger than you or smaller. In addition, any such attacks made against humanoids (giant) gain a +2 circumstance bonus on attack rolls.
